sgd:source:delta.description: Generate the sfdx content in source format and destructive change from two git commits

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

to.name: to
to.description: commit sha to where the diff is done

from.name: from
from.description: commit sha from where the diff is done [git rev-list --max-parents=0 HEAD]

ignore.name: ignore
ignore.description: file listing paths to explicitly ignore for any diff actions

ignore-destructive.name: ignore-destructive
ignore-destructive.description: file listing paths to explicitly ignore for any destructive actions

source.name: source
source.description: source folder focus location related to --repo

ignore-whitespace.name: ignore-whitespace
ignore-whitespace.description: ignore git diff whitespace (space, tab, eol) changes

api-version.name: api-version
api-version.description: salesforce metadata API version, default to sfdx-project.json "sourceApiVersion" attribute or latest version

include.name: include
include.description: file listing paths to explicitly include for any diff actions

include-destructive.name: include-destructive
include-destructive.description: file listing paths to explicitly include for any destructive actions
